subject: Wall Street Green Trading Summit 2007 Proceedings
body:
WSGTS Email






Missed the 
Wall Street Green Trading Summit? 
Now you can watch it on DVD
Click Here For Conference Brochure
Click Here to Order DVD for $595
Click Here to Order CD for $395
Or call 201 784 5389 to order by phone


Complete coverage of this Sold Out event is
			                available on DVD.  Speaker's presentations are
                also available for purchase on CD-ROM. 


What is
			          carbon neutral? How are clean energy technologies tied to
			          emissions trading? What are the carbon investment
			          opportunities? These and other timely questions were
			          discussed and answered at the sixth annual Wall Street
			          Green Trading and Finance Summit. The speakers gave a
			          fantastic update of what is occurring in green trading
			          markets. This annual event broke new ground in the
	            development of environmental financial markets.



Conference comments from participants include: 


"This (conference) was very worthwhile - I really got a lot
			    out of it.  And also very well-run. I have told many other
			    people about it, so I will book early next year!
			    Thanks again"

"I wanted to congratulate you on the Wall Street Green
			    Trading conference. You are a pioneer and in the US
			    "green" community, your efforts and foresight are greatly
			    appreciated."



Conference highlights included: 

• US Carbon Market Developments
• What's the Difference Between Carbon Credits & Offsets
• What's New in European Carbon Trading
• What Impact Will Carbon Regulation Have on US Businesses
• What's the Commercial Value of Carbon Sequestration
• What are Climate Exchanges
• How Renewables & Carbon Offsets Interact
• What is Carbon Finance
• Why the US is the Next Carbon Market




Organized by:
		        Global Change Associates & Hedge Connection

Media Partner:
		        Reuters
